rdf:Description.dc:title: Travels into North America (Volume 1 of 3)
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Pehr Kalm (1716–1779)
John Reinhold Forster (1729–1798)
rdf:Description.dc:rights: This eBook is for the use of anyone anywhere at no cost and with almost no restrictions whatsoever. You may copy it, give it away or re-use it under the terms of the Project Gutenberg License included with this eBook or online at www.gutenberg.org. This eBook is produced by the Online Distributed Proofreading Team at www.pgdp.net. This is volume one of a three volume set. Volume two is available as ebook number 72103, volume three as 72737. This book originally appeared in Swedish as En Resa til Norra America (Stockholm, 1753–1761). A Dutch translation, which originally appeared in 1770 under the title Reis door Noord Amerika, is also available from Project Gutenberg.
